arts.ttl: Union Berlin finally wins again as new coach Steffen Baumgart leads team past Mainz in Bundesliga
arts.sum: Hollerbach got the home team off to a great start when he won the ball from Mainz defender Danny da Costa and fired between the legs of goalkeeper Robin Zentner in the first minute. Goals from Benedict Hollerbach and Robert Skov gave Union its first win since October, and the first at the third attempt since former player Baumgart’s return as coach for the fired Bo Svensson.

arts.ttl: Sunday's Bundesliga predictions including Union Berlin vs. Mainz
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides score predictions and previews for all of today's Bundesliga fixtures, including Union Berlin vs. Mainz.

arts.ttl: Union Berlin vs Mainz preview: Hosts continue on quest to recover form
arts.sum: Union Berlin’s Bundesliga showdown with Mainz on Sunday at Stadion An der Alten Försterei carries high stakes, with the result having major implications for both the relegation battle and the race for Champions League qualification.

arts.ttl: Preview: Union Berlin vs. Mainz 05 - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Bundesliga clash between Union Berlin and Mainz 05, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Burkardt ruled out of Mainz's clash with Union Berlin
arts.sum: Mainz have provided an update on Jonathan Burkardt, who will miss the game against Union Berlin after pulling his hamstring against Bayer Leverkusen.
